properties.displayName: Process Explorer Driver Creation By Non-Sysinternals Binary
properties.query:
DeviceFileEvents
| where (FolderPath contains "\\PROCEXP" and FolderPath endswith ".sys") and (not((InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\procexp.exe" or InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\procexp64.exe")))

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects creation of the Process Explorer drivers by processes other than Process Explorer (procexp) itself.
Hack tools or malware may use the Process Explorer driver to elevate privileges, drops it to disk for a few moments, runs a service using that dri
